channel.title: [SOLVED] Can't compile patch
channel.description:
Help, I can't anymore compile patches, it's passed sometimes since I had compiled my last one, I have a fresh reinstallation of my SO and now anything seems to work, the axoloti's patch program can't locate the 'make', I'm under windows 7 32bit.
Here the output:
Generate code complete Start compiling patch 'make' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. shell task failed, exit value: 1 Compiling patch failed ( C:\xampp\htdocs\xampp\Sito\pub\axp\bio-involution-2.axp )

item.title: [SOLVED] Can't compile patch
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

Follow instructions for installing runtime here

Installing on Windows User Guide
Normal Installation To reduce size we split the application into two parts, the main axoloti application, and a runtime which contains other required files. You must download and install both initially. (Usually updates will only require the main application to be downloaded and installed.) download both application bundle and axoloti_runtime go to http://github.com/axoloti/axoloti/releases, you will see the 'latest release' download axo_runtime_win.(version).msi download axoloti_win_(versâ€¦

Note: you only need to change the runtime directory in preferences if you install in a non standard location.

Read full topic

item.title: [SOLVED] Can't compile patch
item.dc:creator: @Androoclops
item.description:
@Androoclops wrote:

I'm having this issue as well but I don't understand how you resolved the issue. Can anyone clarify?

Read full topic

item.title: [SOLVED] Can't compile patch
item.dc:creator: @Mattia Mattia
item.description:
@Mattia wrote:

FIXED! I had missed to configure the path for the runtime directory in the preference, now it run smoothly!

Read full topic
